metadata.synopsis: Bust of Ketheric Thorm in Isobel's Room in Haven.A reminder about the past.Has variation if we learned about their connection

0.text: *A bust of Ketheric Thorm as he once was, a devotee of Selûne, just like his daughter, Isobel.*
